trans-unit.source: A class that serializes a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> instance to and from Atom 1.0 format.

Use this class to serialize instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> and to create an instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> from an XML document that contains an Atom 1.0 entry.

If you have derived a class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> and want to serialize it, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter%601> formatter instead.
The Atom 1.0 specification allows for fractional seconds to be specified in any of its date constructs.
When serializing and deserializing, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] implementation ignores the fractional seconds.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter"></xref> class.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to specify a class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> to instantiate when a syndication item is read in.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> derived instance to associate with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20ItemFormatter"></xref>
Verifies whether the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> contains a valid Atom 1.0 syndication item.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read from.
A value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> contains a valid Atom 1.0 syndication item.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> instance.

The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance is not automatically associated with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter> used to create it.
A new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> instance.
Gets the type of the syndication item associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter"></xref>.
The type of the syndication item associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.
The default value of this property is `true`.
Attribute extensions are XML attributes that are not defined in the Atom 1.0 specification.
This property determines whether to write these attributes during serialization.

Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown attributes inside the `AttributeExtensions` properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance when deserializing an Atom1.0 entry.
A value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.
Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.
The default value of this property is `true`.
Element extensions are XML elements that are not defined in the Atom 1.0 specification.
This property determines whether to write these elements during serialization.

Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown elements inside the `ElementExtensions` properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance when deserializing an Atom1.0 entry.
A value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.
Reads an Atom 1.0 syndication item from the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read from.
Gets the syndication version used by the formatter.
[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] supports Atom 1.0 and RSS 2.0 syndication versions.
The syndication version used by the formatter.

Writes the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> to write to.
Implements the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema"></xref> method.
Override this method to return your own schema.
`Null`.
Implements the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)"></xref> method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> used to read XML document.
Implements the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)"></xref> method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> used to write the XML node.
